text: Yeovil railway station may refer to several railway stations in Yeovil, Somerset, England: * Yeovil Pen Mill railway station, on the Heart of Wessex Line (from Bristol Temple Meads to Weymouth). * Yeovil Junction railway station, on the West of England Main Line south west of Waterloo station towards Exeter. * The former Yeovil Town railway station, that closed on 1 March 1967.
title: Yeovil railway station
